headline: A Look At BlackRock (BLK) Valuation After Record Inflows Strong Quarter And Higher Cash Returns
summary: BlackRock (BLK) is back in focus after its latest earnings update, where record net inflows, higher assets under management and a 10% dividend increase, along with a larger buyback authorization, drew fresh attention from income focused investors. See our latest analysis for BlackRock. The recent earnings release, higher dividend and larger buyback authorization appear to have energized sentiment, with a 7.20% year to date share price return and a 1 year total shareholder return of 18.12%...

headline: Jim Cramer on Goldman and Other Major Banks: “It Takes a Lot to Get These Stocks Out of Their Tailspin”
summary: The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (NYSE:GS) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer put under a microscope. headline: Digital Asset Funds Drew in $2.17B Last Week, Highest Level in Three Months
summary: Bitcoin ETFs led with a $1.42 billion netflow as digital asset funds saw their highest inflows since October last week.

headline: BlackRock ties senior executives’ pay to private market profits
summary: The scheme allows eligible executives to receive a share of carried interest from a pool of BlackRock’s main private markets funds.

headline: Trump is going to Davos — here are the big names who aren't
summary: A who's who of heads of state, top CEOs and tech pioneers are landing in Davos for the 2026 World Economic Forum meeting. But some big names aren't going.

headline: Bitcoin and ether ETFs log their best week since October
summary: U.S.-listed spot bitcoin and ether ETFs logged their strongest week in three months, led by bullish bets.
